column2: an A.M. Eatery////The food is fine
column3: but you have to pay for it with your sanity if you wish to visit on a weekend. I visited with friends and I envisioned that we would catch up on each other's lives over breakfast cocktails and pancakes. My prickly pear margarita was just a glass of simple syrup
column4: and I couldn't hear my friends over the cacophony of one million people jammed into a small building plus top 40's music blaring over the speaker system.
